name: Salicylic Acid Acne Healing Dots Mega Value Pack + Free Travel Bag
about: What it is:A limited-edition pouch of 60 bestselling blemish patches that combine clean hydrocolloid polymer technology and actives to zap breakouts overnight..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Acne and Blemishes.Formulation:Mask.Highlighted Ingredients:- Encapsulated Salicylic Acid: Penetrates pores to target acne blemishes and blackheads..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Don‚Äôt let a breakout ruin your spring vibe‚Äîfight them on the go with 60 bestselling patches in a limited-edition pouch. Combining clean hydrocolloid polymer technology and acne-targeting ingredients like encapsulated salicylic acid, these patches will minimize your breakouts in six hours or less..This Set Contains:- 60 Blemish Patches.Clinical Results:In a 6-hour consumer perception study:
ingredients: -Encapsulated Salicylic Acid: Penetrates pores to target acne blemishes and blackheads. .-Retinol: Promotes clear-looking skin in the form of retinyl acetate, vitamin A. .-Aloe Vera Leaf Extract: Gently soothes while minimizing the appearance of redness. ..Salicylic Acid 0.5%, Cellulose Gum, Glyceryl Hydrogenated Rosinate, Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Retinyl Acetate...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After cleansing, apply a dot, tacky-side down, directly on your blemish..-For best results, wear for at least six hours..-For even peskier breakouts, use with Peace Out Acne Serum (sold separately)...-If you‚Äôre experiencing any area of excessive dryness, open skin, or went a little heavy handed with chemical exfoliation, give your skin a little resting time before using.

reviews.review_title: Must have for healing spots faster!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Helps my deep zits heal faster and sticks quite good! I only wish they came in cute shapes üòÅ

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use these before going to sleep and when I wake up they are always way smaller. I was really surprised because it even helps with the enormous pimples from my period! Be careful when you open the package, because they tend to stick on the sides
